name: Electric Eel Conduit
text: You can establish an ongoing electrical charge between you and a target you have grabbed.
prerequisites: Wis 17, Electric Eel Shock, Electric Eel Style, Elemental Fist, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +13 or monk level 9th.
benefit: You gain one additional Elemental Fist (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Player’s Guide 158) attempt per day. When you successfully grapple a creature, you may expend two uses of Elemental Fist as a swift action to set up an electric charge between yourself and the creature. If you do, the target takes electricity damage equal to 1d6 plus your Wisdom modifier each round you maintain the grapple. This damage ceases when you are no longer grappling the target.
text_zh: 你可以在你和擒抱对象之间制造持续的电流。
prerequisites_zh: 感知17，电鳗流，电鳗休克，元素之拳，精通徒手打击，BAB+13或武僧9级。
benefit_zh: 你每天获得一次额外的元素之拳次数。 当你成功擒抱一个生物时，以一个迅捷动作，消耗两次元素之拳的使用次数来使你和这个生物之间产生一个电流通道。此通道会使目标在你维持擒抱的每一轮受到1d6+你的感知修正的闪电伤害。当你不再擒抱目标时，这个伤害就会消失。
